text: Samvel Nikoyan is the current speaker of the parliament of Armenia. In 2005 he was awarded the "Andranik Ozanyan" medal of the Armed Forces of Armenia. He was also given the RA Prime Minister Commemorative Medal. Nikoyan is married with three children. ==Other websites== *Samvel Nikoyan - National Assembly of the Republic of Armenia Category:Armenian politicians Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Legislative speakers Category:21st-century Armenian people
title: Samvel Nikoyan
